pr_title: Fixes #1760 - `listcompactions` command error is not helpful

timeline.message: added a more helpful error message when no port is passed with the listcompactions command

timeline.body:
Just a minor wording suggestion:

```suggestion
    checkState(hasPort(), "the address does not include a port");
```

The reason for this is that the exception could also occur when the user has not "given" any address. For example, if it's our own internal code. In that case, the word "given" might be confusing.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Just a minor wording suggestion:

Suggested change
checkState(hasPort(), "The given address does not include a port");
checkState(hasPort(), "the address does not include a port");

The reason for this is that the exception could also occur when the user has not "given" any address. For example, if it's our own internal code. In that case, the word "given" might be confusing.
timeline.author: ctubbsii
